DOC.brief_title: Post-Market , Long-Term Follow Up Mobi-C® Cervical Disc One Two Level Treatment Cervical Disc Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multi-center , consecutive cohort study . Subjects invited participate study complete Mobi-C IDE study ( G050212 ) . In study , five hundred seventy-five subject randomize either Mobi-C prosthesis control treatment - conventional anterior cervical discectomy fusion ( ACDF ) anterior cervical plating . The study randomize 2 1 ratio ( two Mobi-C subject every one subject receive ACDF anterior cervical plate ) . The subject retention rate Mobi-C subject 80.1 % ( 1 level ) -84.4 % ( 2 level ) 7 year . As non-inferiority ( 1-level ) superiority ( 2-level ) well establish 7 year , design study focus long-term outcome cohort Mobi-C arm study evaluate durability outcomes 10 year . Study sit invite participate enrol least 10 subject , also high retention rate 7 year ( ≥70 % ) . All subject site contact participate additional 10 year follow visit . It estimate 250 subject enrol 9-12 study site .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Treatment MobiC one two level LDR001 Pivotal Study ( IDE G050212 ) ; 2 . Written inform consent provide subject subject 's legally authorize representative 1 . Documented withdrawal consent prior MobiC study ; 2 . Documented noncompliance ( include unwillingness return site followup visit ) 3 . Reported pregnancy time enrollment , plan become pregnant prior completing study XRays
